UBUDLELWANE NABAXHAMLI NONXIBELELWANO: UBUME






UBUME



USHICILELO



AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



ICandelo lomlawuli wezoBudlelwane nabaXhamli noNxibelelwano lijonge ukukhuthaza ubudlelwane kwiinkonzo zonxibelelwano ngaphandle anangaphakathi ngendlela efanelekileyo zeSebe loRhulumente weMimandla nezeZindlu eNtshona Koloni.

Imisebenzi:

* Ukukhokela nokulawula iinkonzo zonxibelelwano ngaphakathi nangaphandle kwaneeprojekthi ezibalulekileyo zeli sebe kwakeli sebe.
* Ukukhuthaza nokugcina ubudlelwane obububo kunye nabaxhamli bangaphakathi nabangaphandle
* Ukwenza iinkonzo ezincedayo zenkxaso efanelekileyo kwinkqubo yeRental Housing Tribunal ukuze kujongwane ngendlela eyiyo nokuhlolwa, novandlakanyo, nongenelelo kwiimbambano nakwiinkonzo zecandelo lonobhala kubaxhamli beli sebe.
* Ukwenza umsebenzi ofanelekileyo kwiDESIKA YONCEDO kuncedwa abaxhamli beli sebe kungenjalo abo banelungelo lokuxhamla kwinqkubo yokuhlaliswa ezindlwini.
* Ukuqinisekisa ngolawulo olufanelekileyo lolawulo lweeprojekthi ezizodwa umzekelo iHIV-AIDS, EAP, iinkqubo zoLutsha, nokubekwa kweliso ekuphunyezweni kolungelelaniso ngokobulungisa kwimigaqo-nkqubo yamaLungelo oLuntu ingakumbi leyo ichaphazela abantu abaKHUBAZEKILEYO, ASELE BEKHULILE, kunye nezinye izinto ekujoliswe kuzo, njlnjl.
* Ukwenza iinkonzo ezifanelekileyo zonxibelelwano kunye nokunika inkxaso ephathelele yabaxhamli kuwi-ofisi yoMpathiswa umzekelo amaphulo okufikelela eluntwini, ukuhanjelwa kwamaziko, ukuphendula kwimbalelwano njlnjl.
* Ulawulo lokuhlela nokulawulwa ngobuchule kweSIGIDIMI SEENDABA kunye neWEB PAGE.
* Ukumisela nokulawula iYunithi yeeLwimi yesebe.
